translation: Thus, wisdom more secret than secrecy itself has been declared to you by me. Reflect on it fully, then act as you wish.
commentary: 18.63 is thus? They to thee? Knowledge wisdom? has been declared? Guhyat than the secret? Guhyataraam more secret? Maya by Me? reflecting over? This this? Infinitely fully? such as as? wish (thou) wishest? And so? Do act.Commentary Thus has wisdom? more profound than all secrets? been declared to thee by Me.
